Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2009 09:02PM swirleymel wrote: Hi Myra, I remember the panic I felt at being told there was a post radiation treatment lesion on my lung which needed monitoring.  It turned out it was fibrosis caused by the BC radiation and no futher treatment was offered.  My oncologist is loath to perform CAT scans as he said they deliver 100 times more radiation than a chest xray.
